description:
Nobunaga had been sending the daimyo of Yamato, Matsunaga Hisahide various letters, but hasn’t heard back from him, so he orders Chidori to infiltrate Yamato. However, it was said to be impossible to infiltrate Hisahide’s Tamonyama Castle.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’entrée en scène d’un vieil homme dangereux
